Body:
Description: Hello,


The customer noticed that when changing the password, it writes 12 "letters", but it would be more appropriate to put "symbols" because numbers and other symbols suit here as well.
And it might be a little bit confusing for someone.
Screenshot in the attachment.

What We've Learned Updated: 23/05/2025
Client is stating that whenever they attempt to change the password it shows that they've typed in letters instead of mentioning characters or symbols .

Next Steps Updated: 23/05/2025
Will ask for more details.
